page.title: 09ENERY HOLBEACH DROVE
page.content: THE MAIN FUEL USED IN THE AREA IS SOLID FUEL - COAL AND COKE(SOME COKE IS IMORTED). THE COAL OPEN FIRE IS STILL POPULAR IN THE COUNTRY ALTHOUGH NOT SO MUCH IN THE TOWNS AS GAS IS SEEN TO BE MORE CONVENIENT AND WE HAVE NO GAS PIPES LAID THIS FAR OUT AS IT WOULD COST TOO MUCH TO PROVIDE GAS TO THIS WIDESPREAD BUT LOW POPULATED AREA. SOME PEOPLE HOWEVER, RECENTLY HAVE BEEN INSTALLING CALOR GAS AND THIS IS ESPECIALLY POPULAR WITH THE NEW PROPERTY WHICH IS BEING BUILT. OTHER FORMS OF ENERGY USED OF COURSE ARE ELECTRICITY AND OIL AND IT IS STILL POSSIBLE TO FIND A PROPERTY IN THE AREA WHERE NO ELECTRICITY HAS YET BEEN CONNECTED.
